about_the_game:
Just Walk Is An Endurance Game Like No other.

The Players Objective is simple - to Hold down the W key for as long as they can to form the Best Time that will go proudly on the Leader board.

How determined are you to Walk outside your comfort zone?

How much time are you willing to commit to prove you are disciplined, focused and above all obsessed to be number 1?

Out Walk your Family, Friends, Foes and the World.

'To be a champion, compete. To be a great champion, compete with the best, but to be the greatest champion, compete with yourself.'

HOURS OF GAME PLAY

You are the Game. Don't let go of the W key as there are Thousands of Hours of steps to enjoy.

DEEP THINKING

This Game will Indeed Challenge and Push you to the limit and will make you question how intense of a Gamer you are and the values to Life itself?

UNLOCK LOCATIONS

Depending on how long you hold the W key, Unlock 4 great Locations to Walk on.
A Beach
A Forest
A City
and Space.....

LOOK STYLISH

Choose and Wear a hat while you Walk.
So many different looks and themes to suit your Walking Mood...

EXTRA

IF you don't want to spend time Holding down the W key to unlock the Levels and all the Accessories, then you can simply purchase these great components and Jump into the World you wish to Just Walk in.

TIME TO BUY

Also in Extra, if you want the Best Time on the Leader Board without playing the game then there is Time To Buy.
By selecting the Time you wish to purchase, will then be placed on your Overall Time on the Leader Board.

'Win if you can, lose if you must, but always cheat.'

LASTLY - THIS GAME CONTAINS NO

Alcohol References, Cartoon Violence, Comic Mischief, Crude Humour, Drug References, Fantasy Violence, Intense Violence, Mature Humour, Mature Sexual Themes, Mild Language, Mild Lyrics, Mild Violence, Nudity, Sexual Violence and Strong Language.

JUST WALK

Literally....


This game includes optional in-game purchases such as - Levels, Accessories and Time.

name: Just Walk

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4-core CPU @2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: One Character, One way and One Button you must never let go of.Just Walk.
